name: Soulclad
description:
A light-puzzle metroidvania set in a factory that came to a screeching halt many centuries ago. Explore what remains, and help fix the abandoned facility.

With the help of some ghosts and lots of moving blocks, rebuild the legendary giant robot

NOTE: WIP, bug fixes and improvements coming post-jam

A game by JUSTCAMH, made in 1 month.

Music by ClockMaker and sound by Dim
